title: The MOST annoying thing EVER that can happen to you IRL is....
body:
When you're talking to someone that works at a company and AS YOU ARE SPEAKING they say things like "mmmhmm" "okay" " right right." "yeah yeah" MULTIPLE TIMES. IN THE MIDDLE OF YOUR SENTENCES. You know like that lady at the front desk that doesn't give a SH1T about your problems?

edit:lol downvote me plebs. Even though i got a rioter comment and my post is 100% right.
